info.headline: Tornado Warning issued December 13 at 7:50AM CST until December 13 at 8:15AM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 AM CST FOR NORTHEASTERN HOOD COUNTY... At 749 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Granbury, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... Oak Trail Shores around 755 AM CST. Granbury and Pecan Plantation around 805 AM CST. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Mambrino, Tolar, Lake Granbury, Acton, Stockton Bend, Waples, DeCordova and Cresson. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter now! Get to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building and avoid windows.
